name: Through My Eyes (Heart Of Lines)
description:
by Corrie and Louie for the GTMK Game Jam 2021

A drone stuck in an abandoned factory discovers a blind robot. By sharing sight and strength they may finally have a chance of escaping.

An atmospheric retro puzzle game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. 

Art and Programming by Corrie Shea-Pelletier

Original music by Louie Chapman

Additional textures sourced from Chevanon Photography, Anamul Rezwan, and ELEVATE from Pexels, and bugdog from freeimages.com. 

Ambient wind sound from ZapSplat.com. 

Crate breaking sound by vibinchillin from freesound.org.

CRT shader by Cyanilux https://unitylist.com/p/12r2/URP-Retro-CRT-Shader 

NOTE: When synced to the robot it is occasionally possible to clip the camera through a wall and into a kill trigger.  If the game resets unexpectedly that's probably why.  Just be careful when standing right up next to a wall. Sorry about that!
